subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Among the two dozen or so horses in consideration for the Kentucky Derby, there is no head of the class. But a 3-year-old colt named Street Sense could change all that on Saturday.
snippet: Among the two dozen or so horses in consideration for the Kentucky Derby, there is no head of the class. But a 3-year-old colt named Street Sense could change all that on Saturday.
